## Pre-merge Checklist

Before creating this PR, ensure:

- [ ] This branch is based on **latest `main`** (run `git pull origin main` before branching)
- [ ] No merge conflicts with `main` (check PR page)
- [ ] All tests pass locally (run `auditmate start` to verify)
